_readme: LaraCode Watch Configuration - Configure file watching for @claude comment processing

_options.paths: Array of directories/files to watch for changes
_options.searchWord: Comment marker to search for in files (default: @claude)
_options.stopWord: Trigger word in comments to start processing (default: claude!)
_options.mode: Permission mode: interactive (prompts), accept (auto-approve edits), yolo (full auto)
_options.excludePatterns: Glob patterns for files/directories to ignore
